text: Arau muchara babe ami traisa raatira pratisrauti karaichilo arau daha yoga karai seya purna karaichilo. E'idarae te'omra pratipalakara nirdharaita samaya callisa raatita purna haichila. Mucha'i te'omra bhatr haraunaka ka’le, ‘mora anupasthitita mora sampradayara majata tumi mora pratinidhitba karaiba, sansodhana karaiba arau biparyaya srstikaraisakalara patha anusarana nakaraiba’
